import Link from "../Components/Link"; import createAccount from "../utils/createAccount"; const CreateAccount = ({ createCoin, accountList }) => { return (

Let's learn about accounts!

In most cryptos, it's very easy to make hundreds of accounts.
Having a lot of accounts is useful for many reasons! You can have a cold storage account that you never touch and keep under your mattress, while also having a hot wallet account which you use to trade actively.
Let's try creating a few accounts ourselves
Click the button below to create an account!
{accountList.map((account, index) => (

  • Public Key

    This is the key you share!
    {account.publicKey.toString()}

    Private Key

    Never share this with anyone as they can steal your funds!
    {account.secretKey.toString()}
    • ))} Go Next
    ); }; export default CreateAccount;
